item.description:
Join us for our monthly meeting! We have a visitor who will rebut the old saying, "there are no atheists in foxholes." Jason Torpy, president of Military Association of Atheists and Freethinkers, a former army officer, will tell us all about the experiences of military humanists and atheists and the problem of religious conservative dominance in the military. This is a very hot topic nowadays and it should be a fascinating discussion.

The talk will begin at 7pm, but our doors open at 6:30. Feel free to come and meet and talk with others!!!

Visit his website at www.maaf.info
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy setting up the video equipment.
item.name: GWH May Meeting: "There Are Atheists in Foxholes"
